infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Slush to access your camera for video calls and photos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Slush needs microphone access for video recording and voice calls.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Slush to access your photos for profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Slush to use your location to find matches near you.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Allow Slush to access your Face ID biometric data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow Slush to access your location to find potential matches and events near you even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow Slush to access your location to find potential matches and events near you even when the app is in the background.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Slush to access your camera for video calls and photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Slush to access your photos for profile pictures.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Slush to use your location to find matches near you.
